constraintSpec.desc: Require meiversion attribute on the root element.

sch:rule.sch:assert: The root element must have the @meiversion attribute in order to indicate the MEI version of the snippet.

sch:rule.sch:report: If the root element is any other than mei, meiHead, meiCorpus, or music the value of @meiversion must be '5.1-dev+anyStart'.
